page.description: You can now customize the text that is displayed when the SQL Database reports an Insert, Update or Delete error. By default, Alpha Anywhere displays this text for an Update, Delete or Insert Error:

section.description: You can customize this message by going to Grid Properties, Advanced, Other Properties and then setting these property values, as shown in this example:
section.example: dim tmpl.errors.updateError as c = default "Sorry, but the record was not updated. " dim tmpl.errors.deleteError as c = default "Sorry, but the record was not deleted. " dim tmpl.errors.insertError as c = default "Sorry, but the record was not inserted." dim tmpl.errors.showMore as c = default "Show me more..." dim tmpl.errors.showLess as c = default "Show me less..."
